```{r chunk1, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, fig.align = "center", fig.width = 11, fig.height = 9}
par(mar = c(1, 1, 0.1, 0.1))

# Advanced profile check
if (extract$Advanced == 0) {

# Regular profile
radarchart(dradar,
           axistype = 1,
           caxislabels = radarcenterlabels,
           axislabcol = "black",
           calcex = 1.5,
           centerzero = TRUE,
           pcol = participant_colour,
           pfcol = participant_colourinner,
           plwd = 5,
           cglty = 1,
           cglcol = radargrid_colour,
           cglwd = 2,
           plty = 1,
           vlcex = 1.6,
           vlabels = radarlabels)
} else {

# Advanced profile  
radarchart(dradar,
           axistype = 1,
           caxislabels = radarcenterlabels,
           axislabcol = "black",
           calcex = 1.5,
           centerzero = TRUE,
           pcol = c(sample_colour, participant_colour),
           pfcol = c(sample_colourinner, participant_colourinner),
           plwd = 5,
           cglty = c(1,1),
           cglcol = radargrid_colour,
           cglwd = 2,
           plty = c(1,1),
           vlcex = 1.6,
           vlabels = radarlabels)

legend(x = "topright", legend = c(advlegend_participant, advlegend_sample), bty = "n", pch = 20, col = c(participant_colour, sample_colour), cex = 1.2, pt.cex = 4)

}
```
This graph shows how you have scored in comparison to the average Australian with your age `r if (extract$Age >= 18 & extract$Age <= 34) {"(18-34)"} else if (extract$Age >= 35 & extract$Age <= 64) {"(35-64)"}``r if (extract$Gender == "Man" | extract$Gender == "Woman") {" and gender"} else {}`.
